Message: Temporary workaround for keyv ts definitions issue
Description: Keyv package should be removed from Caprine deps before next release (if the root cause of the issue is fixed) because it doesn't actually depend on it. This is there just to fix the issue with keyv ts type definitions not existing in keyv module.
Message Abstract: Temporary workaround for keyv ts definitions issue
Description Abstract: Keyv package should be removed from Caprine deps before next release (if the root cause of the issue is fixed) because it doesn't actually depend on it. This is there just to fix the issue with keyv ts type definitions not existing in keyv module.

Tweak quoted text in the composer in dark mode   Tweak reply tags   Fix disappearing forward icon on shared links in dark mode   Fix a flash after closing settings   Also fixes unintentional background color brightness reduction on vibrant views.   Fix the white background under the typing indicator (fixes #669)   Tweak the link preview in the message composer in full vibrancy mode (fixes #670)   Fix Messenger‚Äôs squished typing indicator bug
Description Abstract: Improve the ‚ÄúMissed call‚Äù dialog in the dark mode Improve the music widget title color in dark mode Fix the stylelint invocation Fix stylelint issues Tweak the ‚Äúnew Messenger version‚Äù banner in dark mode (fixes #835) Tweak the inline replies in dark mode Only modify the text brightness of non-own messages (matches the light mode behavior). Tweak quoted text in the composer in dark mode Tweak reply tags Fix disappearing forward icon on shared links in dark mode Fix a flash after closing settings Also fixes unintentional background color brightness reduction on vibrant views. Fix the white background under the typing indicator (fixes #669) Tweak the link preview in the message composer in full vibrancy mode (fixes #670) Fix Messenger‚Äôs squished typing indicator bug

This CSS rule is no longer needed. Remove unused CSS rules Improve contrast on contact name links Revert ‚ÄúVertically align ‚Äúconversation info‚Äù buttons.‚Äù Messenger fixed this on their side. Our fix has now the opposite effect. Description: Fix ‚ÄúChat bot conversation start‚Äù element styling.   Fix ‚Äútypical response type‚Äù styling in dark mode.   Vertically align ‚Äúconversation info‚Äù buttons.   Prevent content shift on hover in ‚Äúnew conversation list‚Äù in dark mode.   Improve text contrast on message popovers.   Improve sticker search input styling in dark mode.   Fix button styling throughout the app.

Prevent content shift on hover in ‚Äúnew conversation list‚Äù in dark mode. Improve text contrast on message popovers. Improve sticker search input styling in dark mode. Fix button styling throughout the app.

Description: Electron‚Äôs context isolation is preventing any window.Notification modification done by the preload script (browser.js). This change works around that limitation by first injecting custom window.Notification in the main process using webContents.executeJavaScript and then by passing messages between browser context (Messenger code) and the Isolated Context (Caprine‚Äôs browser.js) via window.postMessage/window.addEventListener('message', ‚Ä¶). As a bonus, this PR adds support for onclick and onclose Notification events used by Messenger. That allows us to remove selectConversationByImg, since Messenger selects the conversation in the onclick callback! üòÉ  Fixes #700
Description Abstract: Electron‚Äôs context isolation is preventing any window.Notification modification done by the preload script (browser.js). This change works around that limitation by first injecting custom window.Notification in the main process using webContents.executeJavaScript and then by passing messages between browser context (Messenger code) and the Isolated Context (Caprine‚Äôs browser.js) via window.postMessage/window.addEventListener('message', ‚Ä¶). As a bonus, this PR adds support for onclick and onclose Notification events used by Messenger. That allows us to remove selectConversationByImg, since Messenger selects the conversation in the onclick callback! üòÉ  Fixes #700

Message: Don't hide the right sidebar in compact mode (#517)
Description: I think it's a mistake to forcibly hide the right panel in compact mode. This prevents users from accessing some important features, such as viewing attachments, discussion settings, and more. It's best to leave the right panel visibility at the discretion of each individual user.
Message Abstract: Don't hide the right sidebar in compact mode (#517)
Description Abstract: I think it's a mistake to forcibly hide the right panel in compact mode. This prevents users from accessing some important features, such as viewing attachments, discussion settings, and more. It's best to leave the right panel visibility at the discretion of each individual user.
